author: Five Binaries
title: Yoroi ⇄ Blockfrost bridge
description: Yoroi developement often requires full stack Cardano node + DB Sync, because Yoroi implements only a basic subset of available endpoints.

assessments.note: Yoroi needs a connection into a decentralized node service such as Blockfrost
As described in the comments, this would make development for Yoroi much easier. I still think that new sdk's would have a bigger positive effect than this one.
Such proposal will help developers in creating and maintaining wallets for their projects.
The roadmap and deliverables section are incomplete and this is only acceptable due to the team behind the proposal's experience.
Based on the experience of the proposer, the implementation would very likely succeed.
proposing team looks of great quality and looks potent enough with information and manpower to implement it successfully.
Based on the experience of the proposer, the implementation would very likely succeed.
blockfrost team which is behind this proposal have provided all the information and have no doubts abt the feasibility.

solution: Build a bridge between Yoroi and Blockfrost.io, so that developers can use extended endpoint set to develop advanced features more easily.
experience: We are the creators of Blockfrost.io, creating services and tools lowering barriers to entry for developers.
